CheckDemarche.Vous allez créer: You will create an administrative process page
CheckDemarche.Ce type de fiche: This type of page only concerns processes related to the government or public institutions
CheckDemarche.Exemple: Example: a social housing request is an administrative process
CheckDemarche.Le programme: The Volont'R civic service project is a program
CheckDemarche.Finalement: Okay, I'd rather create a program page
CheckDemarche.je suis sur: I'm sure I want to create an administrative procedureform

AdvancedSearch.Elargir recherche: Try to broaden your search by disabling some filters
AdvancedSearch.Afficher aussi les autres fiches disponi: See also the other cards available in
AdvancedSearch.Afficher aussi les résultats disponibles: Also display the results available in

Tables.no worries: Don't worry, it won't be long
Tables.cherche btn: Look for this button in the content to save it
Tables.futures notifs: Notifications about your organization will appear here
Tables.Réfugiés-info est une plateforme contrib: Réfugiés.info is a contributive platform. You can be part of its improvement
Tables.bilingue: Bilingual? Polyglot? Join the translation effort at your own pace:
Tables.Proposez de nouveaux contenus pour enric: Propose new content to enrich the platform, or help to edit and update existing content
Tables.Ici, vous pourrez accéder à vos contribu: Here, you'll be able to access your contributions

CommentContribuer.DispositifDescription: Programme, workshop, training course, online course, reception desk or any other device directly accessible by refugees.
CommentContribuer.DemarcheDescription: Explain a step-by-step administrative process to make it easier for refugees to access and understand.
CommentContribuer.Déployons ensemble: Let's deploy the platform in your area together
CommentContribuer.StructureDescription: Complete the integration directory to facilitate contact between people and to make it easy for refugees to access the right person.
CommentContribuer.LexiqueDescription: Explain the difficult admin words of integration to make it easier for refugees to understand.
CommentContribuer.TraductionReseau: If you speak another language, join the network:
CommentContribuer.obtenir une cartographie: Réfugiés.info offers an up-to-date map of devices
CommentContribuer.fonctionnalités collaboratives: Thanks to our collaborative features, actors can identify and promote their actions independently. Our team supports them if necessary via our live chat.
CommentContribuer.traduit les informations: Réfugiés.info translates information for you — with real, human translators.
CommentContribuer.Nous définissons ensemble: We help you define your deployment objectives, taking into account the human resources available in your area. Our team travels as needed to train and equip the ambassadors.
CommentContribuer.propose un accompagnement: The Réfugiés.info team offers you tailor-made support.
CommentContribuer.Grâce à la couverture nationale: Thanks to the national coverage of Réfugiés.info, beneficiaries can find more information about schemes close to their homes and throughout France.
CommentContribuer.permet d’orienter vos bénéficiaires: Réfugiés.info helps direct your beneficiaries within your territory and beyond.
CommentContribuer.La plateforme s’appuie: The platform relies on a network of volunteers and translation experts to translate and popularise information in a language suitable for refugees.
CommentContribuer.Commentaires ciblés explications: If a paragraph turns out to be wrong, please react immediately within the paragraph. No need for an account. Look for the icon above by hovering your mouse over the paragraph to be corrected.
CommentContribuer.Suggestion explications: Propose a new wording to make it easier for those responsible for the form. This way, the different entries will be written by several people!
